name: Tell It 2 Us
overview:
A new social experience for people all over the world. It combines the best features from Twitter, Fmylife.com, Facebook, Formspring, and more to give you a brand new intuitive and revolutionary way to share experiences.

For the first time ever, our service gives people from all over the world a way to share the experiences from their life in a fun, social environment. our company will provide a way for people to express their thoughts and ideas through pictures, video, audio, and/or text. Whether it’s comical, there is a moral to “the story,” a lesson learned, or just a tid bit of entertainment, our company gives people the outlet to expression.

Our company will succeed based on user growth, and richness of content. A system has been put in place in which people/users/readers can vote up/down published experiences. This will stop the flooding of uninteresting content.

People are naturally drawn to people, it’s in human DNA. Social websites like Facebook and MySpace helped facilitate communication online. However, many complained that it tainted natural communication with faÃ§ades on instant messages and chatrooms.
